job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of AI capabilities into a customer support system, which is a core aspect of software development and integration, even if the primary focus is support.

job_tasks.phrase: apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to improving an AI system by applying human expertise to its shortcomings, which falls under model improvement and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Providing feedback and participating in fine-tuning sessions are direct activities related to model development and improvement.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies, especially in the context of AI integration, falls under the broader umbrella of software development and integration.

soft_skills.phrase: Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: The expectation to ramp up quickly on multiple products highlights the need for strong learning and adaptability skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on being 'adept at unblocking yourself' points to a need for strong problem-solving and self-sufficiency.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses on integrating AI capabilities into customer resolutions and improving AI systems through feedback and fine-tuning. While there's an element of AI specialization (improving AI systems, fine-tuning), the primary context is applying these improvements to customer support resolutions and prototyping new AI tools within that framework. The role is not about building core AI models from scratch or deep research, but rather about leveraging and enhancing existing AI to improve a software-driven support function. The tasks lean more towards the application and integration of AI within a broader system rather than deep AI model development or specialized GenAI tasks. Therefore, 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' is the most fitting profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI integration and improvement within a customer support context. While it doesn't explicitly mention specific GenAI technologies like LLMs or RAG, the tasks of improving AI systems and fine-tuning are indicative of AI work. The soft skills are also clearly articulated. The confidence is high, but not perfect, as the ad could be more specific about the *type* of AI being used.
